channel.title: Privacy on VULNIX
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on VULNIX

item.title: My Browser Configuration
item.description: A Browser is what we use to access the Internet i.e. the World. The technology has advanced to a level that we can mostly access/use everything from our palms. Out of all the software/applications the mostly helpful and useful one is a Browser. In this post I would like to share my browser configuration and the extensions that I use to make my life a little secure, private and easier.
